Your account  Help

Move your data to an SAP system, programming-free!

#  Data Migration for SAP SAP S/4HANA and Cloud Solutions

written by Frank Finkbohner, Martina Höft, Michael Roth, Jonas Kinold,
Wolfgang Kuchelmeister, Lukas Widera

566 pages, 2024, Print edition hardcover  
ISBN 978-1-4932-2522-4 566 pages, 2024  
E-book formats: EPUB, PDF, online  
ISBN 978-1-4932-2523-1 566 pages, 2024, Print edition hardcover  
E-book formats: EPUB, PDF, online  
ISBN 978-1-4932-2524-8

Whether you’re moving to the cloud, migrating to SAP S/4HANA, or replacing a
legacy system, get the data migration guidance you need in this comprehensive
guide. Evaluate your landscape options and plan your strategy; then walk
through the migration processes for SAP S/4HANA, SAP SuccessFactors, SAP
Ariba, and SAP Business ByDesign. Master built-in tools and templates, IDoc
and ALE distribution models, batch input, Cloud Integration from SAP
Integration Suite, and more!

  * Plan and execute SAP data migration without programming

  * Learn to migrate data to SAP S/4HANA, SAP SuccessFactors, SAP Ariba, and SAP Business ByDesign

  * Explore migration tools including Cloud Integration, SAP Legacy System Migration Workbench, batch input, IDocs, and ALE

About the Book About the E-book 600 pages, hardcover. Reference book format 7
x 10 in. Printed black and white on 60# offset paper from sustainable sources.
Casebound for durability. Reader-friendly serif font (TheAntiquaB 9.5 Pt.).
One-column layout. E-book in full color. PDF and EPUB files for download, DRM-
free with personalized digital watermark. Copy and paste, bookmarks, and
print-out permitted. Table of contents, in-text references, and index fully
linked. Including online book edition in dedicated reader application.

## In this book, you'll learn about:

  1. ### Data Migration Basics

Review the technical fundamentals of data migration in an easy-to-understand
way. Compare migration strategies and scenarios—including greenfield,
brownfield, and hybrid implementations—and learn how to plan your migration
project efficiently from start to finish.

  2. ### SAP Solution Migration

Follow step-by-step instructions to migrate data to SAP systems. See how the
migration cockpit and the migration object modeler ease the transition to SAP
S/4HANA, and get expert guidance for migrating to cloud-based solutions like
SAP SuccessFactors, SAP Ariba, and SAP Business ByDesign.

  3. ### Migration Approaches

Learn to use classic migration methods, including IDoc and ALE distribution
models, batch input, and database migration. Convert data types and data
constellations without the need for programming. Use SAP Legacy System
Migration Workbench and Cloud Integration to seamlessly transition data
between different systems.

## Highlights include:

  * Planning

  * SAP S/4HANA

  * SAP S/4HANA Cloud

  * SAP SuccesFactors

  * SAP Ariba

  * SAP Business ByDesign

  * SAP Legacy System Migration Workbench

  * SAP S/4HANA migration cockpit

  * Cloud Integration

  * SAP S/4HANA migration object modeler

  * Batch input

  * IDoc and ALE distribution models

**Frank Finkbohner** is the SAP product owner for the development of
predefined SAP S/4HANA Cloud data migration content for the SAP S/4HANA
migration cockpit.

**Martina Höft** works in SAP S/4HANA product management in the area of data
migration and data transformation, with a focus on the SAP S/4HANA migration
cockpit.

Dr. **Michael Roth** works in product management at SAP, overseeing the topics
of data migration and data extraction for SAP Business ByDesign.

**Jonas Kinold** is the head of the SAP Integration Services competency center
and is a certified SAP Integration Consultant for the RealCore Group.

**Wolfgang Kuchelmeister** studied mechanical engineering at Georg-Simon-Ohm
University of Applied Sciences in Nürnberg from 1990 to 1996. In 2000, he co-
founded Pentos AG in Munich, which is one of the leading SAP HXM consulting
companies.

**Lukas Widera** has been working at SAP Deutschland SE & Co.KG since 2018 as
a technical solution architect in the global presales team for SAP procurement
solutions.

more >
